title: Black Mirror: Smithereens Ending Explained & Easter Eggs! Season 5 Episode 2
author: Think Story
comment: you should have talked about how the people behind smithereens were able to get more information on chris than the fbi and police themselves. says a lot about social media in this day and age!
Whether you think it was a good or a bad episode, we can all agree that Andrew Scott's performance was astounding

Also, in the end during the credits where bill goes back to meditating and everyone is on their phone reading about the story, it shows how quickly we move on from tragic events in the news, and how unaffected we are by it because we are desensitized.
andrew scott's performance was so good im literally in shock how well he plays his characters
description:
Black Mirror is back with Season 5 Episode 2 "Smithereens". In this video we'll be breaking down and analyzing the ending as well as its many easter eggs.
